name: Find out how many Amps your airsoft lipo pack can push
name_original: Find out how many Amps your airsoft lipo pack can push
description:
By knowing the mAh and C rating of a Lipo pack you can find out how many amps of current draw the pack can handle. mAh deals with capacity while C rating tells how fast the energy can be discharged. The Constant C rating in particular refers to amp rate that the Lipo pack can discharge till being emptied out without getting overheated.

This app helps you find out how much amps a Lipo pack can push theoretically.
